to 20 for finer yarn close to ring single crochet around completely chain 1 single_crochet 3 for sugar n cream or bernat handicrafter cotton to 5 for finer yarn single_crochet 3 in one stitch marked 3 in illustration above single_crochet 3 for sugar n cream or bernat handicrafter cotton to 5 for finer yarn chain 1 to turn now single_crochet one more than you had in previous row in center stitch of the three in one single_crochet 3 in one now now again single_crochet one more than you had in previous row same number as before turning at corner repeat for every row every row will have one more stitch than the previous one repeat until potholder is big enough 14 or 15 double row / ridges for sugar n cream or bernat handicrafter cotton 25 to 27 double row / ridges for thinner yarn finish off with mouse teeth* chain 3 single_crochet in first of the three single_crochet to potholder base on sides marked b in illustration mouse tooth will stretch over approximately 3 row one and a half double row on a sides connect mouse tooth to potholder in every third stitch do not work mouse tooth over ring over ring work slip stitches to make loop hanger less bulky * mouse teeth is how germans
